text: Jiří Hozak (born December 10, 1996) is a Czech professional ice hockey player. He is currently playing for HC Sparta Praha of the Czech Extraliga. Hozak made his Czech Extraliga debut playing with HC Sparta Praha during the 2015-16 Czech Extraliga season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:HC Sparta Praha players Category:Czech ice hockey forwards Category:Sportspeople from Prague
title: Jiří Hozak
